data.title: 851 S 770 E, Heber, UT 84032
data.meta_description: 851 S 770 E, Heber, UT 84032 is a single-family home listed for rent at $4,800 /mo. The 2,930 Square Feet home is a 5 beds, 3 baths single-family home. View more property details, sales history, and Zestimate data on Zillow.
data.text: Short-Term or Long-Term Rental Property COMES FULLY FURNISHED This is a new, fully furnished, modern farmhouse style home located in a very safe, family friendly neighborhood in the beautiful Heber Valley. You are within walking distance from the elementary school, the middle school, and the high school. At 3,000 square feet you will have plenty of room for any size family. There are 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The upstairs bedrooms contain a king size bed in the master bedroom, a queen size bed in the bedroom across the hall, and two twin size beds in the other upstairs bedroom. Each bedroom downstairs is furnished with twin size bunkbeds. In the basement you will find a fully furnished home theatre, complete with a surround sound system, 82" smart tv, and deep seating sectional. Additionally, there is a treadmill for working out and a jungle gym room for children. Upstairs there is a full size kitchen with enough room to comfortably seat ten. In the living room there is a built out fireplace and tv. We have a range of lease options from as short as one month, to as long as twelve months. The price per month increases with each successive decrease in lease time. *Lease Options: 1-month: $7,000 3-month: $6,000 6-month: $5,500 9-month: $5,000 12-month: $4,800 You are only: 2 minutes to Downtown Heber 10 minutes to Deer Creek and Jordanelle Reservoirs 10 minutes to Midway (Swiss Days, Homestead Crater) 15 minutes to Wasatch Mountains (access to world class hiking, biking, camping and more) 20 minutes to Sundance, Deer Valley, and Park City Ski Resorts You will love relaxing by the cozy indoor fire place upstairs where you can gather to play games with the family or choose to sit back and enjoy a movie in the home theatre. Your kids will love the open play spaces and fun activities available to them within the home. The backyard is fenced in, providing you with private outdoor space to enjoy with your group. This house is in a prime location. You're minutes away from world-class fly-fishing, ATV and mountain biking trails, climbing, golfing, and snowmobile trails. In addition to the three amazing ski resorts listed above, there are another four (Brighton, Alta, Snowbird, Solitude) within a 50 minute drive. The Salt Lake City Airport is a short 50 minute drive. Downtown Park City is 20 minutes away. Owner pays for all utilities if the lease term is 2-months or less. Renter is responsible for all utilities if the lease term is 3-months or longer. No pets. No smoking.
